pgmcomponents.gui.mplwidgets¶

File supplies necessary mpl widgets for gui_widgets.py

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Toolbar

pgmcomponents.gui.mplwidgets.canvas¶

Functions¶

draw_figure_w_toolbar(canvas, fig, canvas_toolbar)

pgmcomponents.gui.mplwidgets.draw_figure_w_toolbar(canvas, fig, canvas_toolbar)[source]¶
class pgmcomponents.gui.mplwidgets.Toolbar(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: matplotlib.backends.backend_tkagg.NavigationToolbar2Tk

canvas¶

The figure canvas on which to operate.

Type:

FigureCanvas

win¶

The tk.Window which owns this toolbar.

Type:

tk.Window

pack_toolbar¶

If True, add the toolbar to the parent’s pack manager’s packing list during initialization with side='bottom' and fill='x'. If you want to use the toolbar with a different layout manager, use pack_toolbar=False.

Type:

bool, default: True
